Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class Switch

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.Switch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregateSwitch, EdgeSwitch, RootSwitch
public class Switch extends SimEntity
Represents a Network Switch.

    • id

      public int id
      The switch id

    • level

      public int level
      The level (layer) of the switch in the network topology.

    • datacenterid

      public int datacenterid
      The id of the datacenter where the switch is connected to.

    • uplinkswitchpktlist

      public Map<Integer,List<NetworkPacket>> uplinkswitchpktlist
      Map of packets sent to switches on the uplink, where each key is a switch id and the corresponding value is the packets sent to that switch.

    • downlinkswitchpktlist

      public Map<Integer,List<NetworkPacket>> downlinkswitchpktlist
      Map of packets sent to switches on the downlink, where each key is a switch id and the corresponding value is the packets sent to that switch.

    • hostlist

      public Map<Integer,NetworkHost> hostlist
      Map of hosts connected to the switch, where each key is the host ID and the corresponding value is the host itself.

    • uplinkswitches

      public List<Switch> uplinkswitches
      List of uplink switches.

    • downlinkswitches

      public List<Switch> downlinkswitches
      List of downlink switches.

    • packetTohost

      public Map<Integer,List<NetworkPacket>> packetTohost
      Map of packets sent to hosts connected in the switch, where each key is a host id and the corresponding value is the packets sent to that host.

      Bandwitdh of uplink.

    • BagofTaskVm

      public List<Vm> BagofTaskVm

    • switching_delay

      public double switching_delay
      The time the switch spends to process a received packet. This time is considered constant no matter how many packets the switch have to process.

    • Vmlist

      public Map<Integer,NetworkVm> Vmlist
      A map of VMs connected to this switch.

    • processEvent

      public void processEvent(SimEvent ev)
      Description copied from class: SimEntity
      Processes events or services that are available for the entity. This method is invoked by the CloudSim class whenever there is an event in the deferred queue, which needs to be processed by the entity.

      Parameters:
      ev - information about the event just happened

    • shutdownEntity

      public void shutdownEntity()
      Description copied from class: SimEntity
      Shuts down the entity. This method is invoked by the CloudSim before the simulation finishes. If you want to save data in log files this is the method in which the corresponding code would be placed.
      Specified by:
      shutdownEntity in class SimEntity
